uk.co.dancowan.robots.srv.ui.views.camera
Class ColourBinWidget

java.lang.Object
  org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Widget
      org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Control
          org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Scrollable
              org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Composite
                  uk.co.dancowan.robots.srv.ui.views.camera.ColourBinWidget
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.util.EventListener, org.eclipse.swt.events.PaintListener, org.eclipse.swt.graphics.Drawable, org.eclipse.swt.internal.SWTEventListener, ColourBinListener
public class ColourBinWidget
extends org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Composite
implements ColourBinListener, org.eclipse.swt.events.PaintListener

Class associates an SWT Composite with a colour bin on the SRV1q.

Displays the associated bin's mean YUV content and exposes action to set and get the colour component ranges from the hardware. Implements ColourBinListener to react to colour changes in the bin.

Since:
version 1.0.0
Author:
Dan Cowan
See Also:
ColourBinListener
